page.title: 15TRANSPORT HALWELL&MORELEIGH
page.content: Moreleigh has no bus service. The nearest Western National Service runs through Halwell (on Tuesdays and Fridays) to Kingsbridge - and thence to Plymouth - or to Totnes, where services to Paignton, Torquay and Exeter connect. There is a railway station at Totnes and trains run to Exeter,London and all over Great Britain. There are a privately run and a Western National school bus which may be used in term time by adults. A proposed by-pass round Halwell has ben shelved due, in part, to the economic clime. At peak periods of the holiday season 8,000 cars and 500 lorries over 3 tons have been logged passing through the village each day - this traffic affecting directly only 6 houses and the Inn, but making pedestrian crossing hazardous.
